    • Method Detail

      • createAndConfigureService

        public <T extends AludraService> T createAndConfigureService(ComponentId<T> serviceId,
                                                             AludraContext context,
                                                             boolean wrap)
        Description copied from interface: AludraServiceManager
        Creates and configures a service instance.
        Specified by:
        createAndConfigureService in interface AludraServiceManager
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the instance to create and configure
        Parameters:
        serviceId - A characterization of the requested service.
        context - Current AludraTest context.
        wrap - If true, the service will be wrapped with registered wrappers, otherwise, you will retrieve the plain service object.
        Returns:
        the service instance

      • newImplementorInstance

        public <T> T newImplementorInstance(Class<T> iface)
        Description copied from interface: AludraServiceManager
        Selects the default implementor class configured for the requested interface and returns a new instance of it. If the implementor class implements the Configurable interface, the object is configured before returning it.
        Specified by:
        newImplementorInstance in interface AludraServiceManager
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the instance to create
        Parameters:
        iface - the interface for which to create an implementor instance
        Returns:
        a new instance of the class configured as standard implementor of the interface

      • removeSingleton

        public void removeSingleton(Class<?> iface)
        Description copied from interface: AludraServiceManager
        Removes an instantiated singleton from the internal map of singletons, if it has already been instantiated. If it implements the AludraCloseable interface, its close() method is invoked first.
        Specified by:
        removeSingleton in interface AludraServiceManager
        Parameters:
        iface - Component or service interface class of which to remove the instantiated singleton implementation, if any.
